import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../../context/AuthContext'; const CTA = () => { const { isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); return (

Ready to start learning? Join thousands of students today.

{isAuthenticated ? (
Go to Dashboard
) : ( <>
Sign up for free
Explore courses
)}
); }; export default CTA;
